hero.title: Logistics solutions for the Pharmaceutical industry
hero.description: We manage your pharmaceutical supply chain with precision, security and full regulatory compliance.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we offer specialized solutions for the pharmaceutical industry. We ensure cold chain, strict BPA compliance and complete traceability from manufacturing to final delivery.

items.title: Regulated Storage
items.description: Facilities with temperature, humidity and light control, meeting all BPA requirements and health authority validations.

items.title: Cold Chain Distribution
items.description: Controlled and monitored routes for medicines, vaccines and biologics. GPS tracking and temperature recording.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Relabeling, kitting and repackaging according to country, client or specific regulation.

items.title: Technical Courier
items.description: Urgent deliveries of samples, biological products or critical documents with full traceability.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Import/export coordination of active ingredients, medicines and medical devices with sanitary authorization.

benefits.title: Security, compliance and total traceability
items: BPA compliance and validated sanitary processes.
Cold chain with 24/7 monitoring and alerts.
Traceability by batch, lot number or serial.
Reduced logistics costs with optimized routes.

items.title: Hospital supply
items.fullDesc: Scheduled and urgent deliveries to clinics and health centers.

items.title: Pharmacy distribution
items.fullDesc: National and local network coverage with cold chain.

items.title: Clinical samples
items.fullDesc: Technical courier for clinical studies and trials.

items.title: Medication imports
items.fullDesc: Comprehensive coordination of controlled or refrigerated products.

certificates.description: We operate with BPA certifications and validated processes that guarantee pharmaceutical quality and safety at every stage.
